name: Adversarial Training
description: Degree to which adversarial training is used to improve model robustness.

values.name: Continuous Adversarial Training
values.description: Continuous adversarial training with evolving attack techniques, incorporating new attacks as they are discovered, and using formal verification methods to ensure robustness.

values.name: Robust Adversarial Training
values.description: Robust adversarial training against a wide range of attacks with larger perturbation budgets, using multiple techniques.

values.name: Basic Adversarial Training
values.description: Basic adversarial training with a limited set of attack types and small perturbation budgets.

values.name: None
values.description: No adversarial training used during model development.
